title: Creamy chicken liver pate
ingredients: ['40g salted butter', '1 teaspoon mustard powder', '1/2 red onion, roughly chopped', '2 cloves garlic, roughly chopped', '450g chicken livers, trimmed and halved', '2 tablespoons brandy', '1 teaspoon lemon juice', '40ml double cream', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', 'salt and pepper, to taste']
